short_summary: Supply and delivery of one highway tractor
full_summary:
# Realignment Highway Tractor (RHT-4) - Request for Proposal
## Requisition Information
### Requisition Number
WS3733873958
### Business Identification Number (Vendor ID) - [VID] required for online proposal submission
Please see solicitation description for details.
### Solicitation Title
Supply and Delivery of Highway Tractor in Accordance with Specifications
### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), SPAC
### Business Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec
K1A 0S5
Canada
### Contact Information
Wiebe, Lyland
 sogc-pwgsc.gc.ca
### Requisition Details

The request for proposal (RFP) is for one (1) Highway Tractor in accordance with the specifications outlined herein. Parks Canada Agency (PC) in Jasper, Alberta requires the supply and delivery of this vehicle with all supporting documentation submitted by 2:00 PM EST on January 19, 2024.
